sentence.Network_en: It is this hydrostatic pressure that maintains the turgidity of plant parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 就是这种流体静压维持植物各部分的膨胀度.

sentence.Network_en: It is also apparent that water temperature has a rapid effect on the turgidity of plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 水温对植物膨压的影响是很快的.
